titles: His Majesties letter to the gentry of Yorkshire May, the sixteenth, 1642. To our right trusty and well beloved the gentry of York, and others of this our County of York, whom it doth or may concern.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
notes: At foot: "Given at Our court at York, May the 16, 1642".
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
